titleStmt.title: Vox populi, expressed in XXXV. motions to this present Parliament Being the generall voyce and the humble and earnest request of the people of God in England to that most honorable and religious assembly. For reforming the present corrupt state of the church. Published by Irenæus Philadelphus.
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Lewis, 1606-1680.

titleStmt.title: Vox populi, expressed in XXXV. motions to this present Parliament Being the generall voyce and the humble and earnest request of the people of God in England to that most honorable and religious assembly. For reforming the present corrupt state of the church. Published by Irenæus Philadelphus.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
In this edition, line three of title page reads "in XXXV." In another edition, line three reads "in XXXV. motions".
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
